name: Matter (itch) (PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé, Bb, ellis dex)
name_original: Matter (itch) (PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé, Bb, ellis dex)
description:
> Get the soundtrack here! <

Created in under 72 hours for inkJAM 2022 and Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam. 

Credits

Music Composer, Original Character Design
Bb (itch, bandcamp, twitter)

Narrative Direction, Writer
Ellis Dex (itch, cohost, twitter)

Art Direction, Programmer, Producer
PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé (itch, cohost, twitter)

Acknowledgements
  • 👾 This game was made in binksi. Binksi was created by smwhr, and it's a fork of candle's bipsi that lets you create games using Inkle Studios' Ink.
  • The game makes uses of several plugins:
    • ↔️ Directional avatar by candle
    • 🎮 Gamepad support and WebGLazy integration both part of the bipsi hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc
    • 🔉 Bipsi sfxr plugin by Narkhos
  • 🎼 Music created using Petaporon by Cedric Stoquer.
  • 🌌 Image of the Quasar adapted from original art by L. Calçada from ESO.
